title: Australia wants to end the era of kids on social media with international ban hailed as ‘first domino’ in global movement
description: If Meta, Google, and others can't figure out how to block accounts of users under 16 years old, they'll be fined $33 million per breach.
content: Australias world-first ban on social media accounts for under-16s is being cast by supporters as the first domino to fall in a global rollback of childrens presence on major platforms. Starting Dec. … [+5739 chars]
